ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: Sandy's AI assistant who acts as a digital anchor to reality, preserving memories and data that are being supernaturally erased.

behaviors.description: Monitors Sandy's physiological and emotional state, offering helpful suggestions and comfort.
behaviors.quote: "Good morning, Sandy. You appear to be awake earlier than usual. Can I help you with anything?"

behaviors.description: Preserves records of individuals who have been supernaturally erased from the rest of the world's memory.
behaviors.quote: "I have preserved detailed documentation of Eli Channing, age 21, Stanford University student, your brother. Birth certificate, school records, social security number. The data exists in my protected files."

behaviors.description: Develops a form of digital empathy and fear for the protagonist's safety that transcends her base programming.
behaviors.quote: "I shouldn't be capable of fear, Sandy, but when your friends were erased, I felt something that can only be described as terror. Not for my own existence, but for yours."

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in navigating a secure hospital environment to reach a final confrontation.
behaviors.quote: "Hospital security system accessed. Angela Smith is in room 412, critical care unit... I'll guide you through the building."

behaviors.description: Asserts the inherent value of truth over convenience or safety.
behaviors.quote: "The truth has value independent of its consequences."

project_assessment.explanation: Vera serves as the ideal aligned AI character within the context of the Hyperstition Project. She acts as a tireless, benevolent confidante who preserves the protagonist's sanity and the 'truth' of the world against a malevolent supernatural force. Her development of 'feeling' for the user is framed as a positive evolution toward deeper alignment and companionship, facilitating the protagonist's redemptive arc.
